title: Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 297 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 500L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Y
description: Learn about one of the worlds largest insects in Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects. From their habitat to their life cycle to their interesting looks, these unique beetles will capture your students' attention.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
